mapper.select: SELECT movieCode, movieNm, audits, thumbNail, movieStory, TO_CHAR(startDate,'YYYYMMDD') startDate, TO_CHAR(endDate, 'YYYYMMDD') endDate FROM movie WHERE endDate > SYSDATE

SELECT r.movieCode, r.userId, r.content, TO_CHAR(r.created, 'YYYYMMDD') created FROM moviereply r JOIN member m on m.userId = r.userId JOIN movie e on e.movieCode = r.movieCode WHERE r.movieCode=#{movieCode} ORDER BY r.created DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
